attributes.action: understand that Cilgerran Post Office is a key service in our village and that its closure will not be in the best interests of its villagers. We therefore call on the Prime Minister to intervene to stop Royal Mail closing this vital service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cilgerran Sub-post office is a thriving business, part of a busy social village with approx 1000 residents. Many of the residents are elderly and use the PO to pay bills and withdraw cash and would otherwise need to make the 3.5 mile journey into Cardigan. Public transport is restricted to three buses per day. It is the central hub of the village and vital that it remains open.
